name: Halloween: Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Celebrate Halloween by solving Halloween puzzles! This game includes over 50 challenging jigsaw puzzles with spooky Halloween pictures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM MB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
